isis.stitle: 9 SPEED AND 11 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTO-1X707LL/DLL/MLL AND RTO-1X709MLL MODELS - ASSEMBLE - SYNCHRONIZER ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: SYNCHRONIZER ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Assembly should be done on a clean, flat surface slightly lower than your waist.

note.para: Pins on the LO range synchronizer must line up with the chamfered holes on the sliding clutch bottom.

caution.para: When compressing the HI range synchronizer springs, cover with a shop rag. In the event compression is not achieved the first time, this prevents the springs from leaving the bench area.

step1.para: Place the larger LO range synchronizer ring face down (with pins up) on a bench ( Figure 186).
With the sliding clutch recessed side up, place the sliding clutch on the LO range synchronizer pins ( Figure 186).
In the HI range synchronizer bores, install the three (3) springs ( Figure 187).
Place the HI range synchronizer ring over the LO range synchronizer ring. Rotate the HI range synchronizer until the springs are seated against the pins ( Figure 188).
Cover the assembly with a shop rag.
Apply downward pressure to the HI range synchronizer ring while twisting counterclockwise ( Figure 189). This compresses the springs to fully seat the HI range on the LO range synchronizer.

note.para: Make sure there are three springs and are fully compressed.

step1.para: Make sure you can move the sliding clutch from HI to LO range and back.
